1.name: Unlimited Void
1.description: Traps targets in an infinite void space that overwhelms them with endless information, rendering them completely immobile.

2.name: Malevolent Shrine
2.description: Unleashes relentless slashing and destructive cursed energy over a wide area, hitting all targets with Cleave and Dismantle without a visible barrier.

3.name: Coffin of the Iron Mountain
3.description: Covers the area in a volcanic interior of superheated earth and lava, instantly combusting and incinerating normal sorcerers.

4.name: Horizon of the Captivating Skandha
4.description: Creates a beach/ocean domain where the user can manipulate vast amounts of water and summon fish-like shikigami for coordinated attacks.

5.name: Chimera Shadow Garden
5.description: Fills the space with thick, fluid shadows under the user’s control, allowing summoning of multiple shikigami and advanced shadow techniques.

6.name: Self-Embodiment of Perfection
6.description: Surrounds targets with giant shadowy hands and grants the user direct, touchless soul manipulation over anyone inside.

7.name: Deadly Sentencing
7.description: Establishes a courtroom domain where a shikigami judge issues verdicts; guilty targets are executed instantly by the domain’s rules.

8.name: Idle Death Gamble
8.description: Envelops participants in a high-stakes pachinko game; hitting the jackpot grants the user full, temporary restoration and surge of cursed energy.

9.name: Time Cell Moon Palace
9.description: Forces targets to move by 24 fps animation rules; failure to comply causes cellular freeze and severe physical disruption.

10.name: Womb Profusion
10.description: Summons a giant pillar of cursed spirits that builds up and unleashes a devastating blast of concentrated cursed energy.

11.name: Threefold Affliction
11.description: Fills the domain with floating mushroom-like appendages that guarantee all constructed cursed attacks will unfailingly strike their targets.

12.name: Authentic Mutual Love
12.description: Scatters cross-shaped debris and katanas; allows unlimited use of all copied techniques within the domain, each attack guaranteed to hit.

13.name: Hometown Domain
13.description: Perfectly recreates Yuji’s hometown in intricate detail,  the sure-hit effect targets opponents directly with his soul-rending Dismantle, bypassing the need for physical contact.

14.name: Shining Sea of Growing Branches
14.description: Hanami’s Domain Expansion fires a cursed energy beam from their left arm, triggered by charging the shoulder flower.

15.name: Finger Bearer's Incomplete Domain
15.description: Manifest a warped, technique-less domain from birth, amplifying their power but lacking a sure-hit.

16.name: Graveyard Domain
16.description: Summons a graveyard domain that guarantees death once its cursed technique conditions are fulfilled.

17.name: Kuchisake-Onna’s Simple Domain
17.description: Forces a non-violence vow until her question is answered, after which she attacks with conjured scissors.
